Professional Journey

2018 → Present

iOS Development Manager — SEA

Led development of 10+ production iOS apps, scaling platforms to 4.5K+ DAU and millions of installs. Designed MetalKit rendering engines, analytics pipelines, and modular architectures reused across products.

2022 → 2024

Team Lead & Architect

Delivered PartyZa with a custom Metal rendering engine and SwiftUI-based RSVP flow. Improved render performance by 40% and boosted task completion by 22%.

2018 → 2020

Early Career & Growth

Built watermarking engines, logo generators, SceneKit and MetalKit apps, and received an official Apple Emerging Apps program invitation.
